players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Charlie, why did you remain silent? We need to hear from everyone to find the mafia."
You: "Diana, you're the mafioso. I investigated you last night and you came up as mafia. Everyone vote Diana."
Diana: "I am the detective! Alice is lying. I investigated her last night and she is mafia. She is trying to frame me to save herself."
Charlie: "I was asleep during the night and didn't see or hear anything unusual."
You: "Diana is lying. I am the detective. I investigated her and she is mafia. Charlie, trust me and vote Diana."
